item.title: Congratulating Army Reserve Major Lisa Jaster on her graduation from the Army Ranger School.

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Military Personnel.

item.text: Referred to the Committee on Armed Services. (text of measure as introduced: CR S7492-7493)

summary.text:
Honors Major Lisa Jaster for becoming the first Army Reserve woman and first mother to graduate from Ranger School.

Commends the groundbreaking achievements of the first three women to graduate from Ranger School, Captain Kristen Griest, First Lieutenant Shaye Haver, and Major Lisa Jaster.

Recognizes the Army Reserve's vital role in defending the United States.

Celebrates the determination, patriotism, and willingness to lead of all Ranger School graduates.

bill.title: A resolution congratulating Army Reserve Major Lisa Jaster on her graduation from the Army Ranger School.

item.title: A resolution congratulating Army Reserve Major Lisa Jaster on her graduation from the Army Ranger School.
A resolution congratulating Army Reserve Major Lisa Jaster on her graduation from the Army Ranger School.

latestAction.text: Referred to the Committee on Armed Services. (text of measure as introduced: CR S7492-7493)

dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.
dublinCore.dc:contributor: Congressional Research Service, Library of Congress
dublinCore.dc:description: This file contains bill summaries and statuses for federal legislation. A bill summary describes the most significant provisions of a piece of legislation and details the effects the legislative text may have on current law and federal programs. Bill summaries are authored by the Congressional Research Service (CRS) of the Library of Congress. As stated in Public Law 91-510 (2 USC 166 (d)(6)), one of the duties of CRS is "to prepare summaries and digests of bills and resolutions of a public general nature introduced in the Senate or House of Representatives". For more information, refer to the User Guide that accompanies this file.
